title: Carbon fibers derived from environmentally benign, ethanol-fractionated corn-stover lignin
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2357-2366
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00138A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sagar V. Kanhere, Bronson Lynn, Mark C. Thies, Amod A. Ogale
Corn stover-derived lignin, a sustainable and cheaper precursor, was ALPHA-fractionated and dry-spun using ethanol solvent to produce carbon fibers with improved properties via faster processing.
